products.title: Structured Grey (6516)
products.description: Explore the infinite potential of beautiful fabrics and be inspired by the soft styling effects that make this collection refined and original. And due to the roman blind's specific design, you can easily change the fabric in a matter of minutes. Just pick your choice. Elegant and decorative with soft lighting effects.
